titleStmt.title: Fidessa, more chaste then kinde. By B. Griffin, gent
titleStmt.author: Griffin, B., gent.
Griffin, Bartholomew, d. 1602, attributed author.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the widdow Orwin, for Matthew Lownes,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A.j." between rows of type ornaments; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
